oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1948-07-10 - Johnny Bond performance - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from a Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from July 10, 1948. Featuring Red Foley (announcer) and Johnny Bond and Gene Autry on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.) Recording also contains excerpts of KOMA (Oklahoma City, OK) DJ Joe Roberts talking.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Johnny Bond; Gene Autry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: [Unidentified] talks (incomplete) -- Red Foley introduces Johnny Bond (incomplete) -- Oklahoma Waltz (Johnny Bond) -- Red Foley talks (incomplete) -- Don't Hang Around Me Anymore (Gene Autry) (incomplete) -- Joe Roberts talks (incomplete) -- Joe Roberts talks (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Foley, Red, 1910-1968; Bond, Johnny, 1915-1978; Autry, Gene, 1907-1998; Roberts, Joe; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.);
